name: Red Road
description:
Red Road v 1.3 by @sgtcrispy

Maybe inspired by a certain teaser image released recently...

Movement:

A & D, left arrow key & right arrow key. Spacebar to roll.

Attack:

Point and click with mouse.

Plot:

While out paying your respects to the former sheriff, bandits have taken over the town and taken your family hostage!

Clear them out and get back in time for supper!

Made by Jeremy Elder

twitter.com/sgtcrispy

Created with Game Maker Studio: Pro
